title: See Ya
description:
With Mike and Steve both away, Kirk has to rely on back-up producer Matt Carano in studio. The results are at best a mixed bag. First up is an update on Blind Mike. Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg passed away last Friday and President Trump reacts (19:00). Kirk shoots down Mattâ€™s terrible Top Gun take (35:00). Joe Rogan apologizes for blaming the Oregon fires on Antifa (47:00). Plus a new parody song and audience calls.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
